code: import{useEffect}from"react";import{gsap}from"gsap";import{ScrollTrigger}from"gsap/ScrollTrigger";gsap.registerPlugin(ScrollTrigger);export var useImageReveal=function useImageReveal(el){var delay=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:0;useEffect(function(){gsap.fromTo(el.current,{y:"-100vh"},{y:0,duration:2,delay:delay,ease:"power4.out"});},[el,delay]);};export var
